short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick tab selection. Useful when you have 10 or more open tabs. Press Alt+Shift+0 and enter the index of the tab you need.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick tab selection by index. Very useful when you have 10 or more open tabs. Just press Alt+Shift+0 (Option+Shift+0 on Mac) and enter the index of the tab you need. The shortcut can be edited.

Change log:
2.0 Added tabs preview in a new window
2.1 Added indexes for tabs
3.0 Popup
